name: Space Junk (itch) (Celerius)
description:
The objective of this game is to dodge the space junk whilst trying to collect the charges. You only have one life to complete this in. There are 3 sectors to clear.

Good luck...

For 2022, I am using a random game idea generator to decide what game I will create for a each month. This is my January 2022 submission. 

The idea generator generated the following details I had to abide by:
Environment: Alternate Reality
Goal: Remove All Enemies
Genre: Educational
Rules: Avoid Enemies
Wildcard: Music...

Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
